entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cleanup nullable annotations in razor codegeneration #39360
  • Build WASM DevServer By Default #39357
  • Blazor server application on Ubuntu 20.04 cannot find _framework/blazor.server.js #39354
  • "AspNetCore.OpenIdConnect.Nonce" and "AspNetCore.Correlation" cookies unable to set cookie as Session cookies #39351
  • Error BLAZOR102 when using CSS preprocessing #39344
    Backlog
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.21568.2] Web page shows an unhandled exception while executing the request after Blazor.Polyfill launch #39343
  • Retargeting from 6.0 to 7.0, can't run Angular/React ~ individual auth with error:Could not load type 'System.Security.Cryptography.RSA' #39342
  • Logout does not work properly after refreshing the page if Auth0 is used #39339
  • [Epic] WIP: MVC Enhancements #39338
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [BindNeverAttribute] is not respected during JSON model binding (JSON over-posting vulnerability) #39337
  • Requests using the absolute-form in the request line require the host to match #39335

Closed

  • Rate Limiting for Kestrel (Connection backpressure, etc.) #39362
    .NET 7.0
  • Redesign the current aspnetcore Concurrency limiter middleware to use the new abstractions & implementations #38306
    7.0-preview1
  • DefaultHealthCheckService never logs exceptions from degraded HealtCheckResults #39271
    7.0-preview1
  • Repeatedly reloading of .NET 6 Blazor wasm page in Firefox causes out of memory #39305
    Discussions
  • [Blazor] Image element to display images that are not accessible through HTTP endpoints #25274
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [.NET 6] Publish webapi results in HTTP 404 #39359
  • ModelState errors reported by Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson #33451
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf regression: updates #39326
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #39341
  • Blazor wasm - ability to independently prerender only HeadOutlet component #39333
    Discussions
  • Route Attribute not working as expected on ComponentBase / Blazor #39329
  • Unable to receive authorization header in asp.net core API application #31732
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ApiAuthorization VS Authentication: Null reference on missing configuration dependency #39206

PullRequests

Created

  • Detect HTTP version on invalid HTTP/2 connection #39358
    area-runtime
  • Avoid logging unsupported alternative for complex type binding #39353
    area-mvc
  • Components E2E test cleanup #39349
    area-blazor
  • Allow overriding the host header if doesn't match the absolute-form host #39334
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.2

Merged

  • Don't reference test asset projects in Build.props #39336
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Log exception in HealthCheckEndDegraded message #39355
    area-healthchecks, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix build #39361
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Revert "Remove source-build workaround for sourcelink submodule issue" #39356
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Use correct path for NewtonsoftJson ModelState errors #39058
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Enable codestyle analyzers in VS #39350
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Enable IDE0051: Remove unused private members #39348
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix typo in xml comments #39347
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Format some comments in ProblemDetails.cs #39340
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix RedisCache update that breaks usage against older redis servers #38927
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.2

Updated

  • feat (FeatureCollection): Add `IFeatureCollection.GetRequiredFeature` extension method #39192
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Build ARM64 in main windows build job #38997
    area-runtime
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Avoid declaring RazorPage<T>.Model as nullable by default #39332
    area-mvc
  • Add support for DI in Hub methods #34047
    area-signalr
  • Adding EntryAssembly to AddRazorPages/AddControllers* #39085
    area-mvc
  • Using symbolic link APIs on PhysicalFileResult to obtain the real Length and LastModifiedTime #39330
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Use TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds for clientTimeoutInterval in ClientTime… #39325
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 6.0.2
  • Update Mvc to use LoggerMessageAttribute #38658
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Simplify some build infrastructure #38980
    area-infrastructure
